trans-unit.target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04101_000010_ALGUS<tab>Who dares disturb the slumber of Argath Thadalfus, rightful king of Ivalice!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04101_000011_ALGUS<tab>Descendants of House Beoulve? Then by my sword shall I banish your souls to the deepest hell!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04101_000020_ALGUS<tab>Where... Where am I? This body... It is not my own. Oh, gods, what have I done? Save me Ramza! Save me!
